main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright, disc-shaped object hovering silently over a wooded area in Brooksville, Florida on March 6, 1965.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright, fluorescent glow and was described as round and approximately 50 feet in diameter,It hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight,Several witnesses, including Mr. James Burns and Mr. Joseph Simmons, reported seeing the object at different times,Witnesses observed the object from various locations, including their homes, and reported no sound during the sighting,The case was investigated by Project Blue Book but was classified as unresolved due to lack of conclusive evidence.
witness description: Mr. James Burns and Mr. Joseph Simmons, both residents of Brooksville, Florida
